abstract: Sen Wheeler scores Knox and Stimson as war interventionists
snippet: CHICAGO, June 30 (AP)--Senator Burton K. Wheeler declared tonight that a "new and great anti-war party" would be formed unless the Democratic party pledged not to send American soldiers "to a foreign shore."...

headline.main: WHEELER WARNS HIS PARTY ON WAR; Says a Third Will Be Formed if Democrats Don't Pledge Not to Send Soldiers Abroad HOLDS G.O.P. DUCKS ISSUE Senator Tells Anti-War Rally in Chicago That Willkie Until Recently Urged Our Entry Says Democrats Must Be Clear Calls Them Interventionists

lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, June 30 (AP)--Senator Burton K. Wheeler declared tonight that a "new and great anti-war party" would be formed unless the Democratic party pledged not to send American soldiers "to a foreign shore."
